name: Mouse in the House
overview: Two player only catch-and-chase style arcade game where one player plays a mouse trying to get a meal of cheese and the other plays a cat that's trying to catch the other player before he/she eats the cheese, because he's a cat, and wants a meal of mouse. Avoid the mousetraps, despite their name, they do not discriminate, as they will harm the cat as well. Developed by James C. Hilty and published by Ion International, Inc. in Ahoy! 1986/12 (Issue #36)
